General.Name: VITZROCELL Co.Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: VITZROCELL Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of lithium batteries in South Korea and the United States. The company was formerly known as Teckraf Co., Ltd. and changed its name to VITZROCELL Co., Ltd. in June 2002. VITZROCELL Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Dangjin, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Paul  Jang
1.Title: Chief Marketing Officer & Exec. Managing Director
